About Me

I have always been interested in healthy meals, collecting recipes, and meal planning. I wanted to create simple way to meal plan within a calorie limit.

The purpose of this site is to calculate your meal plan goals, then search for recipes and fill out a menu for the week. As you add a recipe, you will see if you are in the recommended macros and calories for the day.
